      • addSection

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/add/section",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addSection(@RequestParam(name="userName",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String userName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String body)
        Create a new Section
        Parameters:
        userName - (not required : defaults to the logged in user) userName of Professor assigned to section
        body - http request body with Section

      • addProfessorToCourse

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/add/professorToCourse",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addProfessorToCourse(@RequestParam(name="userName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String userName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(name="courseID")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String courseID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(name="semester")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String semester)
        Assign Professor to Section
        Parameters:
        userName - userName of Professor
        courseID - identifier of course such as 'cs252'
        semester - identifier of semester such as 'Fall2018'

      • testProject

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'PROFESSOR\', \'TA\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/run/testall",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> testProject(@RequestParam(name="projectID",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String projectID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(name="userName",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String userName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(name="historic",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              boolean historic)
        Runs the testall
        Parameters:
        projectID - identifier of Project
        userName - (not required) userName of specific student to run testall for
        historic - (not required) boolean requesting historic or not
